description: Multiply by 1, add 1, multiply by 2, add 2, etc.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..898
mathematica: a = {2}; Do[If[EvenQ@ Length@ a, AppendTo[a, Floor[Length[a]/2] Last@ a],AppendTo[a, Last@ a + Floor[Length[a] /2]]], {k, 27}]; Rest@ a (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 22 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
